column1: # Please refer to the manual for more details
# The sequence size (integer, strictly positive value)
# The type of sequence be either 'nucleotide', 'amino-acid' or 'codon'
# Mutation rate between pairs of nucleotides (positive values)
# Equilibrium frequencies of nucleotides (positive values, must sum to 1.0)
# The empirical equilibrium frequencies are those published with each respective model’s original paper.
# Alpha (dS) is the rate of synonymous change (positive value)
# Beta (dN) is the rate of non-synonymous change (positive value)
# corresponds to the transition/transversion ratio (positive value)
# *REQUIRED* parameters if mode == Sa or mode == Sb
